publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-649 Rhoda Grant: Protection of Scotch Whiskyâ€”That the Parliament recognises the continued growth of the Scotch whisky industry; welcomes the initiative announced by the UK Government on 8 October 2007 to enhance the protection of Scotch whisky, and calls on the Scottish Government to work closely with the UK Government to support this important Scottish industry. Supported by: Nanette Milne*, Mr Frank McAveety*, David Whitton*, Peter Peacock*, David Stewart*, Bill Butler*, Ken Macintosh*, Karen Whitefield*, Robin Harper*
S3M-649 Protection of Scotch Whisky (lodged on 16 October 2007) Iain Gray*, Cathie Craigie*, Michael McMahon*
S3M-649 Protection of Scotch Whisky (lodged on 16 October 2007) Jackie Baillie*
S3M-649 Protection of Scotch Whisky (lodged on 16 October 2007) Alison McInnes*
S3M-649 Protection of Scotch Whisky (lodged on 16 October 2007) Mary Scanlon*
